records.summary: Tulsa OK 61st & Harvard residential area UFO 20 - 25 feet off the ground above the trees (front yard).
records.story: Tulsa OK 61st & Harvard residential area UFO 20 - 25 feet off the ground above the trees (front yard) After picking up my kids from school I came home and pulled up to my drive way and discovered that my garage door did not want to open I stepped out of my car and walked around the car to let my kids out when I heard a noise that sounded like electricity /static electricity/low pitch I felt as something was off and had a strange urge to look up in the trees in my front yard.   When I looked up there was a craft/ saucer shaped the size of a medium round kitchen table just hanging there about 20 – 25 feet off the ground just above the treetops.  The craft was very clear I could see every detail on it.  It had green, yellow and red lights rotating in one direction and the craft itself rotated in the opposite direction of the lights.    As I started panicking and telling my kids to get out of the car and go towards the house I kept my eye on the object and felt as I was been watched by whoever or whatever was inside the craft.  The craft than changed its position from facing straight down to angle view (front part of the saucer facing towards the ground and back facing to the sky) and then it just shot up in the sky and to the side as if I blinked and nothing was ever there.   My kids saw the craft from the car.  The metal of the craft was not ordinary it almost looked as it was see through some kind of liquid metal not of this earth.   Until this experience I was not a believer.  This was not something out of this world it almost looked as it moved with the speed of light..

records.story: Large airplane flying low to ground stopping in mid-air hovering for a few seconds then continuing to fly. At 7:00 pm on December 20 2012 me my father and his girlfriend witnessed an airplane that was flying oddly low.   We watched the plane for a few seconds then the plane stopped completely in mid-air.  The large airplane hovered in the sky for a few seconds then rapidly sped up only to stop and hover again for a few more seconds.   My Dad has had aviation training and is familar with flight patterns and manuvers of human aircraft.  The reason I am reporting this on a UFO website is because airplanes can not stop and hover in mid-air. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.story: A large metallic cigar/blimp like object that hovered in the air for 15 to 20 seconds and then shrunk into dispearnace in 1.5 seconds. At about 8:00 am (09:00) I was driving to school in Tulsa Oklahoma when I spotted a flying about hovering in the sky.  I observed the object for about 15 to 20 seconds.  I noticed the object was kind of cigar shaped but fatter in the middle almost blimp like but I have seen a blimp before and it was not a blimp.  The object was metallic and I could see the sun reflecting off ofthe surface of the object.  After oberving the object for 15 to 20 seconds the object shrunk until it disapeared.  The shrinking process occured in about a second and a half and it was gone. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides ittle contact information.  PD))

records.summary: ((HOAX??))  Multiple witnesses report hearing a very strange sound, emanating from the sky.
records.story: Multiple witnesses report hearing a very strange sound, emanating from the sky. This is a first for me, so not sure where or who to report it to and it may be nothing.  I live in a suburb on the outskirts of Tulsa, OK.  This last Wednesday at about 3:00pm, (I know as my son's bus came during the event) we started hearing the strangest noise we've ever heard over my home.   We ran outside as did many others, when it did not stop like a normal aircraft passing would.  The cloud cover was immense, but we could tell something was overhead.  Not just loud, but you could feel the pressure change.   A bunch of people went outside as this went on several minutes, and felt like it lasted forever.  I wish I could accurately describe the sound and the way it felt.  My dogs did not bark like they normally would, they went and hid.  Cars were stopping and everyone was trying to see what it was.   The only thing I saw, was after this noise had passed from overhead, I saw 2 fighter jets fly by at a very low altitude right over my house, through a small cloud break.  This noise kept going and going.  If it was some aircraft, it would have to be circling around and around for the entire length of time.   Even stranger, after, the news here reported at least 12 power transformers spontaneously erupted in fire causing over 1000 people to lose power.  Maybe a coincidence, but weird.   Nothing was mentioned anywhere about the air event, except on Facebook conversations.  My sister in law heard it at her house about 12 miles south, and this was right over my house going in a northeast direction, so it was that loud.  They went out to see what it was there, and couldn't see anything either.   My other sister in law lives close to my neighborhood, and said she was afraid it was the end of the world and was thinking only about her son at school.  At the grocery store yesterday, I overheard two people talking and one mentioned they thought it could be "haarp" related.  I had to look that up to see exactly what it was.  Whatever it was, it was bizarre and even stranger that the transformers blew up and that nothing was mentioned about it from our news sources.    I just wanted to report it somewhere.  Even if it was military maneuvers, it's worth reporting.  Obviously the military was involved somehow as the 2 jets that were following it could be seen. Sincerely, ((name deleted))

records.summary: During the snow fall on Friday night, I stepped out for a cigarette. I heard a strange sound that seemed to be a mix between very dista
records.story: During the snow fall on Friday night, I stepped out for a cigarette. I heard a strange sound that seemed to be a mix between very distant bells and a long drawn out low trumpet sound.  At some point I looked up into the sky at the snow fall and spotted a black circle.  It almost seemed as if it were turning slowly left then 30 seconds later to the right, as if a satellite dish would do when searching for transponders. Each time the sound would resonate into the night like a pulse.  There was what looked like a faint red light in the middle of the circle, that part was hard to tell, it could have been me trying to focus through the snow, but I for certain stared at this black circle that is no longer there, so it was not a shadowed fixture from a tower, something was there.  It was in the South Eastern sky just south of Tulsa University.

It did not appear to be moving and it did appear to be twinkling so I assumed it was a star.   I got out my stargazing app to see what star looked so large and close and there was no major star in that particular spot.   We drove for about 3 more miles and eventually it seemed to make a triangular shape.  For a few minutes it looked as if there were 2 but we aren't sure.   It started to get much clearer and it appeared to look like a craft flying extremely close to the ground but not landing or taking off.  It also at this point appeared to move a little bit and then stop again.  Then we turned north and to our surprise the light seemed to reappear to our left and it continued to move with us.   Then we turned east and it appeared behind us, then disappeared.

It repeated this several times before slowing its speed down to a more fluent motion...   There was no sound as the craft flew directly over Tulsa.  Flashes of red appeared as it  slowed tremendously from its initial speed.  Silently it continued north..   The craft appeared to be cigar- like shape with yellow lights- one large in center with red small lights on either side and two smaller yellow lights on outer ends.   It appeared to float at this speed like a blimp.  It appeared to float further over Tulsa going north to north east...  Time recorded from 10:58 to 11:01 PM.

records.summary: Pyramid shaped UFO sighted over Southern Hills Golf Course Wednesday, April 23rd over TULSA, OKLAHOMA.
records.story: Pyramid shaped UFO sighted over Southern Hills Golf Course Wednesday, April 23rd over TULSA, OKLAHOMA. At 24:40, Wednesday, April 23rd 2014, I was driving in neighborhood from pharmacy.  I was traveling west on 75th Avenue when I noticed two very bright lights.  I thought it was just another car traveling because the two bright lights moved fluently and very smoothly much like a car with its brights on over the hills.  With so many hills in our neighborhood I thought nothing of it. I quickly realized I was wrong.  The two lights were not coming from a car but from a craft in the sky.  I realized it was a UFO.  The bright lights continued from west to east, fluently, over the trees and then made a right turn.  This turn  i would guess to be a 45 degree turn,  which allowed me to see two sides forming a v-shape.  It was moving at a steady rate of traffic so I would guess it was flying 45 to 50 mph. I turned the corner, heading north on Jamestown, as the UFO was directly past.  I turned the corner and decided to follow.   I was able to keep my eyes on it the entire time as I headed North on Harvard.  I immediately turned left. I could now make out the pyramid shape of the object from radiating off the golf course and also told me the craft  was now at 65th street between Harvard and Lewis.    At Lewis, the craft continued on till Riverside Drive then headed north following the interstate.   I got held up at the light and was unable to see it about a minute later when the five cars ahead of me had turned.   I am certain others had to have seen this UFO in Tulsa and I am guessing it was the same craft that was identified in Kansas. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to provide no contact information.  PD))

records.story: Disk shaped UFO shoots out of pink cloud in Tulsa, Oklahoma. It was silver looking, then went VERY bright, like a golden neon light.  It hovered there for a few seconds, then shot off horizontally to the west, too fast for me to even follow with my eyes.   I've never seen a UFO before so this was really exciting to see!

This last Wednesday at about 3:00pm, (I know as my son's bus came during the event) we started hearing the strangest noise we've ever heard over my home.  We ran outside as did many others, when it did not stop like a normal aircraft passing would.  The cloud cover was immense, but we could tell something was overhead.  Not just loud, but you could feel the pressure change.   A bunch of people went outside as this went on several minutes, and felt like it lasted forever.  I wish I could accurately describe the sound and the way it felt.  My dogs did not bark like they normally would, they went and hid.  Cars were stopping and everyone was trying to see what it was.    The only thing I saw, was after this noise had passed from overhead, I saw 2 fighter jets fly by at a very low altitude right over my house, through a small cloud break.  This noise kept going and going.  If it was some aircraft, it would have to be circling around and around for the entire length of time.   Even stranger, after, the news here reported at least 12 power transformers spontaneously erupted in fire causing over 1000 people to lose power.  Maybe a coincidence, but weird.   Nothing was mentioned anywhere about the air event, except on Facebook conversations.  My sister in law heard it at her house about 12 miles south, and this was right over my house going in a northeast direction, so it was that loud.  They went out to see what it was there, and couldn't see anything either.   My other sister in law lives close to my neighborhood, and said she was afraid it was the end of the world and was thinking only about her son at school.  At the grocery store yesterday, I overheard two people talking and one mentioned they thought it could be "haarp" related.  I had to look that up to see exactly what it was.   Whatever it was, it was bizarre and even stranger that the transformers blew up and that nothing was mentioned about it from our news sources.    I just wanted to report it somewhere.  Even if it was military maneuvers, it's worth reporting.  Obviously the military was involved somehow as the 2 jets that were following it could be seen.  Sincerely,  ((name deleted))  Sent from my iPhone ((NUFORC Note:  Witness provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: 3 Round Bright Green Lights not flashing side by side & 1 Red Flashing Light, Loud Craft.
records.story: 3 Round Bright Green Lights not flashing side by side & 1 Red Flashing Light, Loud Craft. Looked out patio door at 2 a.m. In the North Airport area I noticed some really bright green lights side by side in sky.  Thought it was odd and not normal.  So I sat there and waited for it to get closer.  It was low flying, barely above tree top level.  It came about as fast as an airplane taking off would.  When it got close I could see 3 really large Round Bright Green Lights that were not blinking.  It was going South.   When it got to my fence line it stopped and hovered. It was real loud like a lawnmower in the sky. It was so steady hovering there.  I sat there wondering what the heck this thing is? I could not open my door to get a better look, or my Alarm would have went off.  I sat there watching it.  I heard a noise like a transmission would make and those 3 Green Lights rotated counter clockwise and was now Facing East instead of South like they were facing. That was an incredible sight.  The lights literally twirled around fast.  When it turned I now saw a R! ed Flashing Light on the back of this thing and could see about one inch of the Green light lens on one of the lights on the side near me, I knew the lights were still there but now they were facing East.  The craft took slowly off going East now.  This thing had to be black or a dark color cause It was so dark that morning, I could not make out shape of it.  I could not tell what it was. It was not our Police Helicopter or an airplane.  It was not a toy either.  It was too large.  The lights were huge. I live on the flight path of the airport and am used to seeing all kinds of airplanes and helicopters.  Never saw lights like that or a sound like that.  I have spent hours now researching every plane, drone and helicopter I can find and can’t find anything that has 3 Green lights on it that are that large and round and don’t blink.  So wish I knew what it was.   One thing for sure, I saw first hand how these flying crafts change direction so fast.  Apparently they must push a button or a gear and can go from going South to going East real quick.  It must be a new craft too, not many reports of 3 Green lights that are solid and not flashing.  I will never forget what I saw.  It all happened so fast and me being slow at walking, I could not get my camera to take a picture or I would have missed it!

records.summary: I was traveling north on highway 75. It was almost dark outside but still visible to see in the sky. All of sudden when driving north i
records.story: I was traveling north on Highway 75.  It was almost dark outside, but still visible to see in the sky.   All of sudden when driving north I spotted something in the sky.  The sighting was right over the crossing of pole cat creek. up in the sky was a craft with three wings and three sets of wings. The wings were almost like a capital L with another hook on it.   The aircraft was just hovering about 200 feet up.  It was a cylinder type of craft with a sharp front.  The wings of the set of three were aprox 1/3 of the length of the craft.  The wings were almost like frozen.  There was no activity other then the hovering.   At the end was almost like a jet engine but a lot bigger and move developed.  There was also nothing else coming out of this engine no streaks. almost like when you see fumes coming out of an exhaust.  More layers then a regular engine.  The color was almost like a black silk kind of color.  It was somewhat shiny, but still dull.   By the time i got off the exit it was already gone.   There is a lot of plane activity which that is what i thought at first but it was running east to west, instead of running north to south, which the Jenks Airport does.  It was also moving to slow and to low to the ground to be a aircraft.   I'm really not doing this for attention.  I just want to know if anyone else saw what I did, last night.

records.summary: Sun was shining on hovering, still, silver object in western Tulsa sky, about 15 seconds before it vanished.
records.story: Sun was shining on hovering, still, silver object in western Tulsa sky, about 15 seconds before it vanished. I was driving West around 17:45 and notice a shiny object in West sky over Tulsa.  The sun was making it shiny.   I watched it hovering about 15 seconds.  It didn't move.  And then it vanished...disappeared. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Bright object traveling at a west to east direction accelerated and made what can be described as a u turn.
records.story: Bright object traveling at a west to east direction accelerated and made what can be described as a u turn. Object appeared as a moving bright light.  Initially thought to be either a shooting star or satellite.  Traveled as slowly as a satellite, in a west to east direction, but suddenly took an almost perfect 90 degree turn to the north, and then again back to the west.  The object accelerated at a rate at least 5 times as fast as it was traveling initially when it made the two 90 degree turns.

records.summary: Saw multiple balls of light moving across the sky at low altitude.  At one point they slowed down, stopped and fly away rapidly.
records.story: Saw multiple balls of light moving across the sky at low altitude.   At one point they slowed down, stopped and fly away rapidly. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Tulsa UFO with amazing flight path at speed.
records.story: Tulsa UfO with amazing flight path at speed. I am a factually based MD radiologist practicing in a major medical center.  I have never had an experience of this nature. I was sitting in a hot tub shortly before dawn, when a more delta-like boomerang shaped object with a round apex and sharper back corners came into view far away on the eastern horizon.  It had no running lights, and was only faintly identifiable in the night sky as a vague pearlescent entity.  There were no clouds in the sky.   At first, I thought it was an ultralight, but it was so high that the shape never changed as it migrated from my 12 o'clock to my 4 o'clock position in a straight line.  There was no sound. At the 4 o'clock  position, it made a severe 90 degree turn south with no indication of banking or change in shape.  The turn was executed as a smooth alteration in course occurring in a space of approximately 2-3 times the width of the object with no change in speed.  It headed south for 2-3 more seconds and then disappeared from sight abruptly without any preceding alteration in speed or direction.

records.summary: Orange light.
records.story: I'm a security officer from Tulsa.  On the above date and time, I was outside the guard house, having a cigar.  The weather was clear and calm (a front came in around 0630).   I saw an orange light heading due west.  The light slowly pulsate at about 2 second intervals, it was also very large about 3 or 4 times bigger than the largest star.   I couldn't tell how high it was or what the light was attached to.   It didn't make any noise. ((NUFORC Note:  We have corrected to date to February 08th, 2016.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: It was a light going in half a circle every 6 seconds; it made a whistling sound, then it stopped and a car alarm went off.
records.story: it was a light going in half a circle every 6 seconds and it made a whistling sound than it stopped and a car alarm went off. i was outside playing basketball when i noticed a circle light went by in a half circle motion so o stopped and seen it again than i counted how long until it did it again and i did that three times just to verify my answer and it was 6 seconds it was about 1:00 a.m when it happened than it stopped going around i didn't see it anymore than me and my witness heard a car alarm go off and it was in the area of the light so i said lets go inside to be safe cause that was a UFO.

records.summary: While F-16s took off from TUL, a white disc/cloud object accelerated and disappeared on horizon.
records.story: While F-16s took off from TUL, a white disc/cloud object accelerated and disappeared on horizon. I am a aircraft ground handler at Tulsa International Airport (KTUL).  Between 14:27 and 14:33, I was servicing a plane parked on the B terminal, when I heard the local Air National Guard F-16s taking off.  I watched the lead aircraft rotate on Runway 36R heading North and then a small white disc- shaped cloud above the airport caught my eye.   The "cloud" began to accelerate to the east from a stationary position at a high rate of speed until it disappeared from my vision.   4 F-16s in total took off and circled the airport for aproximately 30 mins, then landed and taxied back to the Air Guard base.   2 had local Oklahoma 138th FW  tail markings and 2 had Ohio 180th FW markings.

records.summary: Assumed a bright light was a star until it wobbled, moved back and forth and straight up.  ((NUFORC Note:  Star?  PD))
records.story: Assumed a bright light was a star until it wobbled, moved back and forth and straight up I was sitting outside of my house in midtown Tulsa.  In the eastern sky, I observed what I thought was a bright star until I noticed that it was kind of wobbling back and forth.  As I watched it shot up very  quickly and then returned to its station.  It kept doing this and then what really took my breath away was when it shot straight up moving kind of jerky.   I watched it and went and got my husband out of bed.  He has to get up at 6 for work, so I wouldn't do that on a whim.  He observed the light moving back and forth as well and then went back to bed.  I  watched and I tried to video it but was unable to.  I wanted to call someone, but I didn't know who to call.  The mosquitoes are bad this time of year, so I would go in the house and come out again and look.  This continued until I went to bed about an hour and a half later.  I wish I had stayed up now! ((NUFORC Note:  Star?  PD))

records.summary: I was sitting out @ about 11:00 pm.  I noticed a bright-what looked to be a star-in the distance. ((NUFORC Note:  Star?  PD))
records.story: I was sitting out in my lawn chair about 11:00 pm.  I noticed a bright-what looked to be a star-in the distance.  It seemed pretty high in the air, to where i was not able to see any details.  The light moved erratically sideways and back, straight up and back, seemingly not a very far distance from point of origin. light always returned to original position.   I watched for hours before i went to bed.  I thought it might be my eyes playing tricks or clouds moving but  i was  holding my head perfectly still, and was certain that it was moving jerkily up and sideways.  If anyone else experienced this i would be very interested in information

records.summary: Three separate crafts taking off in a 90 degree angle.
records.story: Three separate crafts taking off in a 90 degree angle. Around 2:15 am, I was letting my dogs outside before we went to bed, and as I looked up at the sky off to the southwestern direction I saw three crafts with flashing lights in a triangle shape.  I then saw two crafts, appear in the center of the triangle shoot off in a ball of light and very fast.  The smaller crafts took off in a northern direction and seconds after that the triangle split up and took off in a strait upward direction in a 90 degree angle.   Very shocking I got the dogs in and closed the blinds and did not see any further craft or UFO’s in the sky.  I will say it was amazing, and exiting all at the same time.

records.summary: High speed light.
records.story: High speed light. Myself and a coworker were driving westbound on Hwy 51, we both saw a light travel over our heads at an extremely high rate of speed while curving upward until it disappeared into the distance.   We both agreed it was going faster than any known aircraft.

records.summary: T-shaped object, moving slow, with one red one green and four white lights.
records.story: T-shapes object, moving slow, with one red one green and four white lights. My husband and I were out on our patio off in the distance which looked like a plane at first.  When it got closer it was moving slow probably 10 mph close to the ground.   When it got over us we saw circular lights one red, one green and four white lights under the craft and the craft looked T-shaped.  When it passed over our house it seemed to look like it just stopped moving from a distance.  We got in our car to follow it, but we couldn't find it.

records.summary: I have great pictures. Been going on for over a week. They are reddish some flash bright white and moves L to R.((anonymous report))
records.story: I have great pictures. Been going on for over a week. They are reddish some flash bright white and moves from left to right .  See crafts move zigzag .making some type of formation. I wish I had a good lens or telescope.  It's amazing.  Even see some at dusk.  I wish someone would come and watch these with me.  It would blow your mind.

records.summary: 3 flying objects seen, no sound, no lights, crafts flying in a line formation, appeared to be gray-to tan in color, almost invisible ag
records.story: 3 flying objects seen, no sound, no lights, crafts flying in a line formation, appeared to be gray-to tan in color, almost invisible against the partly cloudy night sky.  Passenger aircraft flew directly over the craft and moved much slower, easily identifiable as passenger jet.  The three crafts appeared to be flying at a high speed, and made no sound.   Following the sighting, immediately, aircraft traffic increased to a rate of half a dozen within 15 minutes of sighting.  All were using what I would describe as search lights to communicate morse code.  Very abnormal behavior.  30 minutes later, a single unknown craft identical to the first 3 was observed for 25 seconds, flying from northeast to south.

records.summary: At approximately 05:30 on 10/18/2016 I witnessed a series of 3 triangular shaped craft.  All 3 had lights on the the 3 points of a perf
records.story: At approximately 05:30 on 10/18/2016 I witnessed a series of 3 triangular shaped craft.  All 3 had lights on the the 3 points of a perfect equilateral triangle.  First  at 05:35 then 5-7 minutes later the 2nd and 5-7 after that one came the third.

records.summary: Metallic, egg-shaped, silent, low-flying, object.
records.story: Metallic, egg-shaped, silent, low-flying, object. The object I witnessed flew over my house in the early afternoon.  I live under a common commercial and military flight path so I'm used to seeing interesting jets and planes flying overhead.   This object caught my eye because it was not only flying in the wrong direction from the usual flight path, but it was also perfectly silent, leaving no trail.  The object seemed to be roughly the size of a short school bus and flying about 40 stories high at probably 50 mph.  It was heading perfectly North.  The speed stayed consistent as I watched it fly beyond the horizon.  The object was more of a chrome I'd say than silver.  It reflected the ground an sky like a mirror.  The object also flew with the slightly smaller end pointed North in the direction it was heading. I hope this helps anyone who may have seen a similar object.  I've always wondered what it may be and if anyone else has seen the same. ((NUFORC Note:  Source of report indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: It was approximately noon in southern Tulsa, and my sister, mother and I were headed back from lunch. We saw a strange coppery, round o
records.story: It was approximately noon in southern Tulsa, and my sister, mother and I were headed back from lunch.  We saw a strange coppery, round object far away and close to the horizon.  It had a round object that either reflected or glowed red attached on each side by a short pole.  After a few minutes of going further away, the two side objects were released and slowly floated up into the sky until we could no longer see them.  The main object soon sped up and passed beyond the horizon, out of sight. ((NUFORC Note:  Source of report indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Large almost stationary distant object with white and blinking red lights
records.story: Large almost stationary distant object with white and blinking red lights Noticed an extraordinarily bright star NE of my location; after several seconds of watching it, the star appeared to be blinking.  Figured it was a distant airplane. Some minutes later, I looked again, the object appeared stationary.  After several more minutes, same thing.  The blinking was intriguing, so I grabbed my binoculars. I braced the binoculars against a door to get a steady focus.  The object appeared to be a string of horizontal lights, with red lights blinking somewhere along the middle and another on the left end.  Figured it was a very distant jet, and the sighting was occluded by atmospheric conditions. Over the space of about 45 minutes, the apparent direction of travel was to the east and it may have been moving with the earth's rotation.  Thinking it was a planet (unlikely, as it was well to the north), I double checked with "in-the-sky.org."  All of the planets were eliminated as an explanation. After a total of about 90 minutes, I went back to look again and the object had moved well north and slightly west of its previous position.  Another look through the binoculars provided pretty much the same description, with the possible exception of a gap in the lights. As I type this, it is moving below the tree line out sight in the general direction of Wichita, Kansas.

records.summary: Two fast moving green and silver orbs pass over Tulsa, Oklahoma.
records.story: Two fast moving green and silver orbs pass over Tulsa, Oklahoma. I am a 52-year-old researcher/data collection specialist.  I was sitting with my 78-year-old mother and 13 year old son on our back porch. I was looking to the southeast and two green glowing orbs appeared from behind a neighbor’s roofline.  From my prospective, they appeared to be glowing green orbs with a barely noticeable silver edge around one edge of the green glowing circle; as if a sliver of the side of the object was observable.  The silver part seemed solid like it was metal. It is clear that they were several miles away.  They were also very high up.  It was a hot hazy day with hazy clouds high in the sky.  The objects were clearly observed being obscured by the clouds at times.  The two orbs stayed the same distance from each other throughout the observation.  They moved much quicker than an airplane but the movement was steady; not jerking around like perhaps a laser pointer might look. The orbs were heading towards us and the closer they got, the more obvious the details became.  It also was more obvious that the objects were very high up.  Once overhead, my perception was that they were not very big, maybe the size of a car.  At no time did we hear any sound coming from them. A middle aged couple was out for a walk and noticed my family looking at the sky.  They turned around and I asked them to look for the lights.  They saw them too.  We all stood and watched the lights move quickly but steadily towards us and over the house until we could not see them anymore.  My son said that right before they disappeared from our view, they circled each other.  This is the only observation that they broke the formation that we observed throughout.  My son is the only one who saw them circle each other.

records.summary: Large lighted stationary for over 1 hour three witnesses and possable photo on phone  object was lighted from top to bottom.
records.story: large lighted stationary for over one hour three wittnesses and possable photo on phone object was lighted from top to bottom and resev On or about 1;10 am while walking my dog I looked up to see what constellations where visible since the sky was cleat with exception of a few small clouds.  As I looked to the north west I noted a large lighted object that was staying in the same location from my location in my driveway I could see it in obstructed at approx. 1 o'oclock  high at approx. 15000 to 18000 feet  At first it appeared to be a chevron, small at top wider at bottom lit at bottom and top with lights running vertical up the body of  the object  my 34 yr.  Old son in law 13 yr.old grandson and myself a retired police officer  drawings and time listings from first sight at 1:10 am to last sighting as it sped away at 2:18 am  I also tried to take photo with my phone but it wouldn't work till right before it left ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with the witness, and he seemed to us to be quite sincere, and sober-minded.  We suspect that he is a very good witness.  PD))

records.summary: Looked like 2 kites
records.story: looked like 2 kites On April 27th, 2017, around 11am, I was heading to work, I was on a city bus 306 when 2 objects cought my eye at the east they looked like kite`s with a tail attached to it, at first so i did not think anything of it but one of the objects was at a standstill and did not move the other object would orbit around it.  They seem pretty far away and up in the sky i say around 10,000 feet.  I tryed to take a picture but it did not show in the picture by the time i got off the bus 5 minutes later the objects where not in site.

records.summary: My 13 year-old grandson and I were driving home from a Tulsa hospital when he noticed 2 bright lights and in the sky and asked if it wa
records.story: My 13 year-old grandson and I were driving home from a Tulsa hospital, when he noticed 2 bright lights and in the sky and asked if it was an airplane, since we were within about 8 miles of an airport.  It was bright like an airplane light but there was 2 of them.  At times they seemed as though they were hovering barely moving and then moved quickly around .  We kept driving so we only observed them for about 5 minutes. About 1 1/2 hours earlier, just West of Inola on our way to the hospital, we noticed a bright circle of light northeast of Tulsa, and about the time my Grandson asked me what star it was it started moving South. I told him sometimes planes have to circle before they land, but it seemed to be moving slower than it should be.

records.summary: Golden circles with a tail seen circling around the sky.   ((NUFORC Note:  Possibly advertising lights??  PD))
records.story: Golden circles with a tail seen circling around the sky. At approximately 8:00pm on December 7th, 2017, my husband and I witnessed 2 large objects and 2 smaller objects in the sky.  At first they started to blink, and the two larger objects continuously circled each other for around 30 minutes.  The two smaller objects disappeared after about 10 minutes, leaving the 2 larger objects chasing each other in the sky.  They would blink for a while, then be a solid golden color, then go back to blinking and so on.   At one point, they were stationary in the sky for 20 seconds or so, and a silver/blue object fell from one of the crafts, then started flying again.  After about 30 minutes had passed, the two large objects stopped circling in the sky and took off in one direction.   I tried taking a few photos with my phone and managed to capture an image.  It looked like a circle with a tail.

records.summary: Bright white light transforming from a star appearance to a full blown object of some kind. ((NUFORC Note:  Venus??  PD))
records.story: bright white light transforming from a star appearance to a full blown object of somekind. I went outside and saw a bright star like light.  Thought it might be Jupiter, then the light took the shape of a crescent moon.  Thought it was the moon behind some clouds.  However, it was much larger than what the moon looks like in the sky.   Then it transformed into a huge white light in the shape of a bowl.  I could see a darker outline above the light creating a full round circle shape.  I said what is that?   As I was looking at it the light began to diminish until nothing was left visibly.  Although the light was totally gone I could still see a dark round outline in the sky.   I watched a few more minutes but could not see anything else.  It was so huge!  When I realized it wasn't the moon I knew I must be witnessing a UFO sighting.

records.summary: At approx. 0240 am, I awakened from a deep sleep from noise coming from the sky.  It was very loud.
records.story: Tonight at approximately 240 A.M. I awakened from a deep sleep from noise coming from the Sky. It was very loud, and sounded a bit like a low flying jet except it hovered.  It was so loud my house vibrated.  I looked outside and didn't see anything unusual but it's been raining and was cloudy.  The sound was so strange that I am frightened and cannot get back to sleep.

records.summary: Was outside to smoke my final cigarette of the evening and noticed a low flying craft with no sound travelling northeast in the night
records.story: I was outside to smoke my final cigarette of the evening, and noticed a low flying craft with no sound, travelling northeast in the night sky.  I watched it for about a minute and a half, and it never changed shape or blinked.  I lost sight of it as it seemed to fly lower and lower and disappeared into the treetops.

records.summary: Midtown Tulsa Oklahoma:witnessed one bright ball of light high in the night sky. Looked up to notice the beauty of the moon lit clouds
records.story: Midtown Tulsa Oklahoma:  witnessed one bright ball of light high in the night sky.  Looked up to notice the beauty of the moon lit clouds streaking over head.  Realized this ball of light buzzing higher than the aircraft and moving way to fast and awkward to be an aircraft we have today.  Headed north towards airport TUL I.  Now a lot of air traffic.... Helicopters? air base off 169hw 56th....  We don't own anything thAt can do that.

records.summary: Spherical red light moving through the night sky. It came from the north and moved south. Lost sight of it after 3 minutes. The light w
records.story: Spherical red light moving through the night sky.  It came from the north and moved south.  Lost sight of it after 3 minutes.  The light was steady, but appeared to have a shadow moving along the edge of it.

records.summary: Unusual colored object changing to white, rapidly diminishing in size tapering brightness.
records.story: Unusual colored object changing to white, rapidly diminishing in size tapering brightness. ime:  4:50 AM cdt  Sky conditions:  thin overcast per infrared satellite recordings on weather.unisys.com Unusual lighted object spotted moving southwesterly direction over city while driving south on Lewis Avenue near 3rd street, returning home from airport passenger drop-off.  First noticed when object was easterly direction from Lewis, crossed in front of observer at indeterminate altitude.  Speed also indeterminate due to unknown distance to object. Initial size of object approximately that of a lemon held at arm's length, shape indeterminate, colors varying and ended up white.  Rapidly grew smaller.  By the time observer got camera on target (maybe 10 seconds max), object had diminished in size to almost a point.  Short video shows very bright white light moving along straight line across the observer's route, in a southwesterly direction becoming rapidly smaller then vanishing. Unusual lights and change of object's size unrecorded, but the character of the point of white light and the rapid disappearance (tapered of rapidly, not a sudden “off” like a light switch phenomenon) are recorded on video.  Possibly tapered off due to entering cloud layer but no haziness evident on video.

records.summary: Appeared as a very large whistling meteor turned almost 90° and then appeared and sounded as very fast moving aircraft over Oklahoma.
records.story: Appeared as a very large whistling meteor turned almost 90° and then appeared and sounded as very fast moving aircraft over Oklahoma Looked like a falling star then got larger, brighter appeared to be orange sparks behind it sort of like a bottle rocket but by now about the size of what I would imagine a small aircraft in a Terminal predicament would look like.  A blue hue appeared behind it around the orange and a whistle sound could now be heard.  The blue diminished and the orange sparks started to lessen.  Front point had turned into what appeared to be a growing glowing white round light which at first was a small circle of light but dark in the center and progressed into being all white light as the Sparks continue to diminish.  By now the whistle turned into a hum that sounded similar to a small aircraft not in distress.  When the orange sparks disappeared the hum continued and all that was left was a blueish or green light and a small gold/white/gold/white light and only for a moment a red light.   From there it proceeded out of sight, trees were blocking my view, looking and sounding like a small aircraft but moving much faster than any plane that I've ever known of and the hum diminished respectively with the sight of it.  It first appeared moving South and barely East from my location as it appeared to drop down and made almost a 90 degrees curve to head East but a little North.  About 1/8 of the way towards North from due East.I don't know latitudes and longitudes.  It did only travel in two straight very distinctive lines.  The turn was maneuvered at the point where the orange sparks were brightest and largest immeditely after the turn is when the blue hue appeared and sparks right after that started to diminish and as the sparks start to diminish is when the whistle turn into a hum.   After the Sparks diminished that's when it turned into the bluish light the flashing light which went dark and the red light which only blinked once left only a bluish-green light.  White circle appeared just barely before the blue hue was completely gone, the white circle was! gone when the lights started appearing in the other colors at! the fro nt point.  The colored lights were in the form of a small triangle with unequal sides when the red light blinked but the white and gold appeared in different relations to the bluish green light. I heard the whistle for about one-and-a-half seconds and about 75% of that time was before the curve and about 25% after.  The curve was made instantly. Same amount of time it would take a second hand on a clock to go to the next second after it started to move but before it hit the next second, that's how long it took the curve to be accomplished. If a possible altitude is necessary I can only guess and that would be it appeared from nowhere to begin to fall from the sky and after the curve would be below the average cloud level. It occurred during a clear night, no clouds and could see stars.  Please reply to this message?  I know I can't leave personal info in a message, but I would like to know what that was or at least that someone has looked into it.  And especially for any questions ! or comments that you might have.  Thank you.

records.summary: Floating bright object.
records.story: Floating bright object Floating/stationary object in sky.  Noticed it while waiting for fireworks. Was extremely bright at first, but it since has slightly adjusted its position and brightness.  Planes/helicopters have flown almost close to it and continue to circle it seems like.  Too bright to be a star and too low.  It has only moved ever so slightly so it's not a plane or helicopter.  Started at 9:15 PM or so

records.summary: Early hour that morning I saw a mother ship.Size of a football field. Above houses. No sound. Tubing on both sides. Nothing man made.

records.story: I was laying in bed trying to go to sleep and felt something slightly shaking my room and a very loud noise buzzing.  I looked out my window and couldn't see anything but it definitely sounded nothing like an airplane, car, helicopter.  It felt magnetic.

records.story: Driving along hwy 412 you in the sky it had 4 lights one on each side.  It just hovered with each light blinking one after another.  It was just there and it gave me a creepy feeling.

records.summary: Slow moving boomerang object
records.story: Slow moving boomerang object Was outside when I looked up and saw a slow moving object with no lights.  Looked like a boomerang with a curved nose.  It made no sound and looked like it was just gliding across the sky.  Was hard to see.

records.summary: ((NUFORC Note:  "Starlink" satellites?  PD))
records.story: On October 27th 2019 approximately around 22:00 I was sitting in my outside Hot tub that sits on my backyard porch,while looking up at the stars I noticed what I initially was a possible flock of geese..there were several flocks moving different directions...this of course made me question myself thinking they were flocks of geese simply because they were too far up in the sky and they were moving at different directions and moving very fast..at closer inspection I could see more of the appearance of the phenomenon. They all looked see through and like large circles of clouds or white smoke as if they were possibly trying to cloak within the clouds. They literally appeared to be large cloud like circles moving different directions and quickly...we saw about 8 total over 30 minutes. I absolutely believe this to be a UFO and a very strange one at that. They almost looked more organic in nature than like a metal made machine. No lights were seen on or around th! em...they were more just translucent. Three people in my family also saw these and agree they were not only incredibly strange but not of this earth.  This occurred within the city of Tulsa Oklahoma.  I did see a older video post on the UK Mirror that looked very much like the craft saw. These in this post were seen during the day and looked like smoke circles as well. Considering they were more than one makes me think this could be a fleet traveling.No sounds were heard with these at all.

records.summary: Multi-color rotating star object
records.story: Multi-color rotating star object Tulsa, Oklahoma.  I regularly observe strange, color-twinkling star-like objects, in the four quadrants of the sky.  They appear to be regularly positioned and are clearly no ordinary “star” or “planet”.  They appear, to the naked eye, as almost a dice-shaped device, “spinning” on one of its corners, and flashing regularly, white, green, and red.  I am 63 years old and have been sky watching all of my life and cannot explain what these new objects in the sky are.  I first noticed them in 2012.  I called the St. Louis Planetarium in hopes that someone there could clue me in to what these objects are; but the only response I got was someone trying to convince me about the “twinkling” that occurs as bodies in space rise or set through our atmosphere, especially near the horizons.  I felt that my questions were quickly dismissed.  My gut tells me that these are some kind of UFO and/or military crafts.  I find the objects disconcerting, especially since very few ! people notice them or even care about hearing about them.
